headline: Hardware-Secured, Off-Chain, Crypto Transactions
paragraphs: Phonon is a open-source Layer 0 protocol which enables off-chain transfers of digital assets using secure hardware. Phonon lets you turn any cryptocurrency into P2P cash: with private, fast, & free transactions.
With no node infrastructure required, Phonon serves as a unique new tool for blockchain scaling, privacy, and trustless cross-chain transactions.
